attributes.review: I had high hopes for this app. When I saw the advertisement for it pop up on my screen, I was delighted. An entire app devoted to bunker boy? Yes please ğŸ¥°ğŸ¤¤. Nothing would make me happier than to get endless content of the Cheeto straight to my cellular device. Unfortunately, it turned out to be horrible. It took a total of 69 (ğŸ˜«ğŸ’¦) days to download. I had nothing else to do during that time obviously, so I just stared at a wall ğŸ‘€ and chanted his name. I missed my brotherâ€™s sisterâ€™s auntâ€™s neighborâ€™s teacherâ€™s cousinâ€™s pastorâ€™s dogâ€™s funeral because of how long I waited ğŸ˜ A worthwhile sacrifice (I thought) when my phone screen finally lit up. Excitedly, I lunged for my phone, the pale glow illuminating my sunken eyes and sun deprived skin. Immediately upon looking at the screen, a strange feeling overcame me. I began itching and writhing, and my skin felt like it was moving on itâ€™s own. I stumbled to the bathroom and turned on the light, only to start screaming. ğŸ‘¹ My skin was becoming more and more orange by the second, my stomach bloating into a massive beer belly, my hair retracting completely until I was completely bald (luckily I had my novelty Daddy Donald toupee which I put on later), and finally, my brain shrunk to the size of a small pea (to match the size of my micro penis which had just sprouted). I screamed in horror. I had become the thing I loved most. Suddenly, I feel rumbling started, softly at first, then louder. I thought it was an earthquake. After I few seconds, however, I realized it was a faint chanting that was growing ever closer. â€œOne of us. One of us. One of us.â€ ğŸ—£ I heard banging on the outside of the bathroom door. I locked the door and dove behind the shower curtain. The door didnâ€™t hold. It broke in two and figures began approaching me, grasping at me. It took me a few seconds to realize, but it was an army of fellow Donalds. I had found my people. I let them take me to their secret base of operation underneath Trumpâ€™s golf course and we partied all night long. This app is not for you if you are scared of a good time ğŸ˜‰ Only gave 1/5 stars because I am now an ugly, racist, homophobic, misogynistic, psychopathic bigot. Love the app other than that though ğŸ¥°
